page.title: 02LOCAL SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: The following 7 primary schools send children to the South Hunsley Comprehensive School:South Cave;North Cave;Brough;Elloughton;Welton;North Ferriby;Swanland.The heads meet termly These schools try to build up good relations between their 4th year Junior children by arranging events during their last primary school term. {Country Dance Afternoon:}Group Dancing and also each school shows own dance. Held usually at South Cave School. {Musical/Drama morning:}Each school & a South Hunsley 1st year class give a 10 minute programme. At South Hunsley. {Mathematical Morning:}At South Hunsley {Spring Walk:}A 12 mile circular walk with refreshment points.Children and parents participate.Money divided between school PTA and a Walk Trust which gives money to charities. {Also held:Swimming Gala:Athletics.
